alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 7:03PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Brevard County through 745 PM EST... At 702 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Merritt Island Wildlife Refuge to near Lone Cabbage Fish Camp to 6 miles south of Holopaw. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Titusville, Rockledge, and Cocoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for east central Florida.
